#summary The listing element is an obsolete method of rendering text in a fixed-width font.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *listing element*

== Usage ==

You should use the [PreElement pre] element instead of `listing`.

The `listing` element was deprecated in HTML 3.2 and is not included in [SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] or [SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5].

== Attributes ==

  * [ListingAlignAttribute align]
  * [ListingHeightAttribute height]
  * [ListingWidthAttribute width]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
